// API Configuration
const API_CONFIG={// Development environment
development:{baseURL:'https://bplo-user.onrender.com/api'},// Production environment (Render deployment)
production:{baseURL:'https://bplo-user.onrender.com/api'}};// Get current environment
const environment=process.env.NODE_ENV||'development';// Export the appropriate configuration
export const API_BASE_URL=API_CONFIG[environment].baseURL;// Helper function to build API URLs
export const buildApiUrl=endpoint=>{return`${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint.startsWith('/')?endpoint:`/${endpoint}`}`;};
